```{r opts,message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library("knitr")
library("runr")
py <- proc_python()
py$start()
knit_engines$set(python = function(options) {
    knitr:::wrap(py$exec(options$code), options)
})
opts_chunk$set(tidy=FALSE,engine='python',engine.path='python')
print(py$exec(a=1))
```

a = 1

print(a)
